name: bazodiac-unified
description: Bazodiac Unified Platform - Immersive Astrology/Identity Platform

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:marketing" "npm run dev:onboarding" "npm run dev:agents"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:marketing && npm run build:onboarding && npm run build:agents
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/marketing && npm install && cd ../onboarding && npm install && cd ../agents && npm install && cd ../../packages/config && npm install && cd ../services && npm install
scripts.supabase:generate: cd supabase && npx supabase gen types typescript --local > types/database.types.ts
